clauses.title: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason
clauses.description: This service can edit any content on the service for whatever the reason and at their sole discretion.
clauses.clause_text: or edit any of your User Material,

case.text: Content you post may be edited by the service for any reason

clauses.title: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text: or to remove

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text: However, this is not an absolute right and Headspace may have legal or legitimate grounds for keeping such data.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: These third-party cookies are placed by third-party advertising platforms or networks in order to deliver ads and track ad performance,

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: or to restrict, suspend, or terminate your access to all or any part of the Products, particularly where User Material breaches this section 7, and we may do this with or without giving you any prior notice.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason
clauses.description: The service reserves the right, for any or no reason, to refuse to post or reject user communications.
clauses.clause_text: We reserve the right, in our sole discretion, to refuse to post

case.text: User-generated content can be blocked or censored for any reason

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: If Headspace or substantially all of our assets are acquired by a third party, in which case personal data held by us about our customers will be one of the transferred assets.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: Headspace and our analytics partners use technologies such as cookies, beacons, tags, and scripts to enable a service to recognize your device

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: Your continued use of the Products constitutes your agreement to abide by the Terms as changed.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: and to grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing without any payment of money or any other form of consideration to you or to any third party.

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action.
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.
clauses.clause_text: AND YOU WAIVE ANY RIGHT TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS-ACTION LAWSUIT OR CLASS-WIDE ARBITRATION.

case.text: You waive your right to a class action.

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: referring/exit pages,

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: EXCEPT FOR CERTAIN TYPES OF DISPUTES MENTIONED IN THE ARBITRATION CLAUSE, YOU AND HEADSPACE AGREE THAT DISPUTES RELATING TO THESE TERMS OR YOUR USE OF THE PRODUCTS WILL BERESOLVED BY MANDATORY BINDING ARBITRATION,

case.text: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

clauses.title: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed
clauses.description: You must provide your legal name and pseudonyms aren't allowed. This case doesn't apply to Services for which transparency regarding users identities is relevant for their purposes.
clauses.clause_text: To become a Member you need to go to the relevant section of the Products, then submit your first name, last name and email address to us,

case.text: You must provide your legal name, pseudonyms are not allowed

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: IN NO EVENT SHALL THE TOTAL AGGREGATE LIABILITY OF THE PROTECTED ENTITIES TO YOU FOR ALL DAMAGES, LOSSES AND CAUSES OF ACTION (WHETHER IN CONTRACT OR TORT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING FROM THESE TERMS OF USE OR YOUR USE OF THE PRODUCTS EXCEED, IN THE AGGREGATE, THE ACTUAL AMOUNT, IF ANY, PAID BY YOU TO HEADSPACE FOR YOUR USE OF THE PRODUCTS IN QUESTION.

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
clauses.description: The service may employ a broad copyright license over feedback, proposals, ideas and suggestions submitted, including the right to use them without restriction, compensation or obligation to the user, but they do not claim ownership on them.
clauses.clause_text:
Any inquiries, feedback, suggestions, ideas, other information which is not part of your use of the Products or User Material that you provide to us (collectively, “Submissions”) will be treated as non-proprietary and non-confidential.
By transmitting, uploading, posting, e-mailing, or otherwise submitting Submissions to the Products, you grant, and you represent and warrant that you have the right to grant, to Headspace an irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty free, worldwide license to use, telecast, copy, perform, display, edit, distribute and otherwise exploit the Submissions, or any portion thereof and any ideas, concepts, or know how contained therein, with or without attribution, and without the requirement of any permission from or payment to you or to any other person or entity, in any manner (including, without limitation, for commercial, publicity, trade, promotional, or advertising purposes) and in any and all media now known or hereafter devised, and to prepare derivative works of, or incorporate into other works, such Submissions, and to grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing without any payment of money or any other form of consideration to you or to any third party.

case.text: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: A right to erasure: in some cases, you have the right to obtain the erasure of personal data concerning you.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: We do not claim any ownership rights in User Material.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: All such users may request and obtain removal of such posted content by contacting Headspace at help@headspace.com and specifically identifying the content to be removed.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text:
AS PART OF YOUR USE OF THE PRODUCTS, YOU AGREE TO THE PROCESSING AND STORAGE OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION IN THE UNITED STATES, INCLUDING THE PROCESSING AND STORING OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION IN THE UNITED STATES FOR THE PURPOSES OF PROCESSING PAYMENTS AND TRACKING INDIVIDUAL USE OF THE PRODUCTS.
BY USING THE PRODUCTS, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT THE UNITED STATES MAY NOT HAVE THE SAME LEVEL OF PROTECTIONS FOR YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION THAT EXISTS IN YOUR COUNTRY OF RESIDENCE, AND YOU NONETHELESS CONSENT TO THE PROCESSING AND STORAGE OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION IN THE UNITED STATES.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
clauses.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: A right to data portability: you have the right to receive the personal data concerning you which you have provided to Headspace, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format,

case.text: You can retrieve an archive of your data

clauses.title: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: Because it's common for members to use the same password to log in to multiple sites, we have partnered up with security firms to track large security breaches and inform you when your credentials are part of a breach causing a risk to your account.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: DATA WE MAY COLLECT

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
As you may know, a recent European Union law called the General Data Protection Regulation (“GDPR”) gives certain rights to applicable individuals in relation to their personal data.
Accordingly, we have implemented transparency and access controls to help such users, including residents of the EU, Switzerland, and the United Kingdom exercise those rights.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: We adopt this CCPA Addendum to comply with the CCPA, and any terms defined in the CCPA have the same meaning when used in this Addendum.

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
If you inform us that you wish to cancel email promotional materials by selecting “unsubscribe” at the bottom of such communication or by emailing us at help@headspace.com, we will remove you from our mailing list.
If you no longer wish to receive push notifications, you may turn them off at the device level.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Security incidents are reported to the authorities
clauses.description: If the service is encountering and dealing with a security incident involving potential losses or damages for its users, its reactions may be reported to the authority as part of a legal proceeding.
clauses.clause_text: We may report any such breach to the relevant law enforcement authorities and we may cooperate with those authorities by disclosing your identity to them.

case.text: Security incidents are reported to the authorities

clauses.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
clauses.clause_text: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold Headspace and its directors, officers, members, investors, managers, employees and agents harmless from any and all claims, liabilities, costs and expenses,

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last update: 01/22/2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
clauses.clause_text: However, by submitting User Material you hereby grant Headspace an irrevocable, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty free, worldwide license to use, telecast, copy, perform, display, edit, distribute and otherwise exploit the User Material you post on the Products, or any portion thereof, and any ideas, concepts, or know how contained therein, with or without attribution, and without the requirement of any permission from or payment to you or to any other person or entity, in any manner (including, without limitation, for commercial, publicity, trade, promotional, or advertising purposes) and in any and all media now known or hereafter devised, and to prepare derivative works of, or incorporate into other works, such User Material,

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: you choose not to activate cookies or to later disable them, you can still visit our website, but your ability to use some features may be limited.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.
clauses.clause_text: If we make any material changes we will notify you by in-Product message, email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account) or by means of a notice in the Products prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest data on our privacy practices.

case.text: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text: You may have access to a free trial period of Headspace Plus, which automatically converts to a paid annual or monthly subscription term after a certain period of time.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.clause_text: We do not necessarily endorse any opinion contained in such material.

clauses.title: Alternative accounts are not allowed
clauses.description:
Services that do not allow multiple or alternative accounts are covered by this case.
Alternative accounts can contribute to an increased privacy, but can also be used to manipulate discussions and polls and might decrease the trustworthiness of a person.
clauses.clause_text: You may not register for more than one Member account.

case.text: Alternative accounts are not allowed

clauses.clause_text: and we cannot guarantee that the Products will be fault free.

case.text: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: The Products and their content are otherwise provided on an “as is” basis and we make no representations or warranties of any kind with respect to them, including as to the accuracy, completeness or currency of the Products or their content.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: harassing, hateful, racially or ethnically offensive,

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text: Your User Material is not illegal, obscene, defamatory, threatening, pornographic,

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You must be 18 years of age, or the age of majority in your province, territory or country, to sign up as a registered user of the Products.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text:
You agree not to use the Products for illegal purposes (including, without limitation, unlawful, harassing, libelous, invasion of another’s privacy, abusive, threatening or obscene purposes) and you agree that you will comply with all laws, rules and regulations related to your use of the Products.
Appropriate legal action may be taken for any illegal or unauthorized use of the Products.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text: If you follow a link to any of these external websites, please note that these websites have their own privacy policies and that we do not accept any responsibility or liability for these websites or their policies. Please check these policies before you submit any personal data to these external websites.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.
clauses.clause_text: If we delay exercising or fail to exercise or enforce any right available to us under these Terms, such delay or failure does not constitute a waiver of that right or any other rights under these Terms.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

clauses.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: The information contained in the Products is for general information purposes only. While we endeavor to keep the information up-to-date and correct, we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability or availability with respect to the Products or the information contained on the Products for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: These and the open statistics are used in aggregate form to give us an indication of the popularity of the content and to help us make decisions about future content and formatting.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
clauses.description: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the services. The legal guardians are responsible for the use of the service by the minor.
clauses.clause_text: Individuals under the age of 18, or the applicable age of majority, may view the audiovisual content displayed in the Products only with the involvement and consent of a parent or legal guardian, under such person's account, and otherwise subject to these Terms.

case.text: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: We are not always able to respond to do-not-track signals.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text: Although we aim to offer you the best service possible, we make no promise that the Products will meet your requirements

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

clauses.title: You agree to comply with the law of the service's country
clauses.description: By using the service, you agree to comply with the applicable laws of the service's jurisdiction, regardless of your location.
clauses.clause_text: Your use of the Products does not violate any applicable law or regulation.

case.text: You agree to comply with the law of the service's country

clauses.clause_text:
As true of most websites, we gather certain data and automatically and store it in log files.
This data may include Internet Protocol (IP) addresses,

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
